subject: Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Hastings Racecourse in Vancouver, British Columbia, helped the Kentucky Derby-winning jockey Mario Gutierrez launch his career, but now the track faces an uncertain future.
snippet: Hastings Racecourse in Vancouver, British Columbia, helped the Kentucky Derby-winning jockey Mario Gutierrez launch his career, but now the track faces an uncertain future.
